text:
Premier League confirms Black Lives Matter to replace player names on the back of shirts for the first 12 matches of the restart.
#BlackLivesMatter logo will then feature on shirts for the rest of the season along with a badge thanking the NHS for their coronavirus work https://t.co/Qst5J08Twm
